pageContext.claim: “Now, the market has been up 70, 80, 90 percent depending on your definition of -- you can look at about 16 different definitions. But the country has been incredible. It had one bad day; that was yesterday.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump can certainly claim credit for stock market increases but not for 70, 80, 90 percent increases. The market rose roughly 15 percent until this point in his presidency.
